content: k2tog knit two stitches together next continue knitting every round until work measures approx 9 from co edge mc main color decrease for crown p purl note switch to dpns when necessary for ease of knitting round 1 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end 16 16 17 sts decrease d 75 pm place marker 80 85 sts round 2 & all even rnds k to end repeat repeat round 3 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end 15 16 17 sts decrease d 60 64 68 sts round s round s round 5 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 15 16 17 sts decrease d 45 48 51 sts st s stitch es round 7 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end 15 16 17 sts decrease d 30 32 34 sts st st stockinette stitch round 9 *k2tog repeat from * to end 15 16 17 sts decrease d 15 16 17 sts finishing cut the yarn and thread through remaining stitches cinch yarn end to close top of hat weave in ends and block 1 a di e m s h ar e o w n i t s h a o r c h t i a a y s l h o n t f a i t fi g t s v e e r e h l a l a t p k # # if you like this pattern check out… party of five sweater visit knitterella com for more original kni-pat38 party of five hat | version 3t patterns for knitters ech editing by dori kershner / florydori@gmail com graphic design & photography by jill zielinski / www jillzielinskidesigns com all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission web knitterella com | email knitterella@knitterella com
